trans-unit.source: Provides a way to wrap a callback method within a transaction boundary.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种方法以在事务边界内包装回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.Transactions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.Transactions" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method.
trans-unit.target: 围绕回调方法包装指定的事务支持。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback" /> to be run under the specified transaction support.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的事务支持下运行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption" /> that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 为委托指定事务支持的 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption" />。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method.
trans-unit.target: 围绕回调方法包装指定的事务支持。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The transacted code cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 无法执行事务处理代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback" /> to be run under the specified transaction support.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的事务支持下运行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption" /> that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 为委托指定事务支持的 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption" />。

trans-unit.source: The reference parameter that returns <see langword="true" /> if the transaction was aborted during the callback method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在回调方法期间中止了事务，则为返回 <see langword="true" /> 的引用参数；否则为返回 <see langword="false" /> 的引用参数。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method and indicates whether the transaction aborted.
trans-unit.target: 围绕回调方法包装指定的事务支持并指示事务是否已中止。

trans-unit.source: The `transactionAborted` parameter indicates the result of the transacted callback that you are invoking.
trans-unit.target: `transactionAborted`参数指示结果的事务处理所调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The transacted code cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 无法执行事务处理代码。
